pages.title: Time-extending Fruit
pages.text: Time-extending Fruit allows you to $(#033dfc)increase the Vault Timer$() inside Vaults by an indefinite amount!$(br2)There are $(#033dfc)4 types$() of fruits, all obtained in various ways with different amounts of $(#033dfc)time added$() & $(#033dfc)additional effects$()

pages.title: Fruit types
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Sweet Kiwi$()$(li)Adds 5 seconds$()$(br)$(#033dfc)Bitter Lemon$()$(li)Adds 30s to the Timer$(li)$(#f00)Wipes away 3 hearts$()$(br)$(#033dfc)Sour Orange$()$(li)Adds 60s to the Timer$(li)$(#f00)Wipes away 5 hearts$()$(br)$(#033dfc)Mystic Pear$()$(li)Adds 300s to the Timer$(li)$(#f00)Wipes away 5 hearts$(li)$(#f00)Inflicts Wither or Poison
